name: Shushhh!
description:
Shushhh!

Inspired by Konami's Bishi-Bashi games, Shushhh! expresses my anger at the democratic system in Singapore and years of social conditioning to not speak out. By breaking expectations of an arcade game, it challenges the idea of what games and performance art can be. 

(Turn computer audio on for sound).

Controls (keyboard only):

  • Y to play/replay.
  • Y, R, B to fight.

Final project for Physical Computing 2 at Goldsmiths, University of London in Mar 2022. Further developed and exhibited at Now Play This 2022 (London) as part of the Design Camp in Apr 2022.
